header.title: Medior Web Developer at Blindspot AI
header.description: Building innovative, modern, and user-friendly websites and applications.

experience.title: About Me
experience.textShort: I am a {{age}}-year-old student and technology enthusiast. I have primarily built my knowledge and skills in the field of Web development, where I have been developing websites and applications for various e-shops and freelancers for several years.
experience.textWorkStuff: Besides web development, I am involved in cybersecurity which I'm training on HackTheBox and TryHackMe & networking (system administration).
experience.textHobbies: Outside of IT, my main interests include DJ'ing, virtual reality (VRChat) and psychology.

doucInfo.title: Douc.info
doucInfo.description: Douc.info is an e-shop and a tutoring platform that connects tutors and students interested in learning more about law and accounting. It includes a functional payment system.

contalk.title: Meetu
contalk.description: Meetu is a Twitter clone developed as part of the final graduation project on the topic of Web Application Development. It includes a complex backend with CRUD operations for Tweets and real-time chat.

novaZeme.title: New Land
novaZeme.description: End-to-end encrypted decentralized mobile application built for creating and managing private groups. The app is not public; for more information, please contact me.

dialog.title: New Land
dialog.description: This project is private and is not available for public viewing. If you wan't to get more information about this project, please contact me.

viceverse.title: Senior Frontend Developer
viceverse.description: I developed e-shops here without using CMS systems. Everything was developed from scratch. Besides the development itself, I was involved in architecture design and server maintenance.

woolville.title: Webmaster
woolville.description: I managed the Woolville website, which is built on the Silius CMS system. I added new products, updated information, and took care of SEO.
